newsitem.title: CROATIA: Croatian stocks lower in lacklustre trade.
newsitem.headline: Croatian stocks lower in lacklustre trade.

text.p: Most Croatian stocks including blue chips traded lower on Thursday in lacklustre activity.
* Ten of 17 active issues fell, two rose and five were flat.
* Volume slightly lower at 6,850 units, turnover flat at 5.7 million.
* Biggest gainer electric manufacturer Koncar added 50 kuna or four percent to 1,300 on volume of 106 shares.
* Biggest decliner textile firm Varteks lost 10 kuna or 11 percent to 80 kuna, selling 220 shares.
* Most active food processor Podravka edged down five kuna to 295, with 1,894 units sold. -- Zagreb Newsroom, 385-1-4557075
